哇卡卡可以直接拉一个代理出来看了一下 就啥也没干 就出来拉还有啥email 啥mysql链接文件>..<
$smtp = new Smtp('mail.baofeng-inc.com');	$smtp->from('cloud@baofeng-inc.com', '暴风云视频');	$smtp->auth('cloud@baofeng-inc.com', 'xxxxxxxx');	$smtp->to($to);	$smtp->subject($subject);	$smtp->text($body,'text/html');	$smtp->send();	echo $smtp->dump();

try {	$pdo = new PDO("mysql:host=192.168.202.152;dbname=dbuserinfo","xxxxx","xxxx"); 	$rs = $pdo -> query("select * from aab"); $result_arr = $rs-> fetchAll();print_r($result_arr);}catch(Exception $e) {	print $e->getMessage();}
